description:
Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it`s Law`s revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für die Freiheit! – Laws Injection Shot trifft ins Schwarze
Jiyuu e! Law Injection Shot Sakuretsu
Pour la liberté ! Law délivre un Injection Shot
To Be Free! Law`s Injection Shot Blasts!
¡Hacia la libertad! El Injection Shot de Law, desatado
За свободу! Техника Ло: Внутренняя Инъекция!
من أجل الحرّيّة! طلقات حُقن لو المتفجّرة!
自由へ! ロー注射[インジェクション]ショット炸裂
